title: Permaculture garden startup in the Morvan France. Inspiring couple with love for the earth.

tasks.task: Conducting a garden project at Fougeret Castle
subtasks: Observing nature to work with permaculture principles
Digging trenches for a polytunnel structure
Preparing and enacting plans for polytunnel setup
Coordinating garden efforts with past colleagues (Ecolony)
Planting medicinal and nitrogen-fixing plants in garden beds
Using manual tools (e.g., multi-functional back scratcher)
Teaching and sharing gardening knowledge through courses/experiments

tasks.task: Transitioning to a sustainable living community
subtasks: Relocating to Fougeret Castle after travels in a bus
Sharing personal experiences and connections (e.g., meeting Sina)
Grounding activities and community building through manual labor

tasks.task: Nurturing growth and community
subtasks: Encouraging plant growth with positive affirmations and sounds
Honoring departed community members (Hilda and Oscar)
Engaging with online audiences via social media interactions (likes, shares, comments, donations)
